content: materials - 2 skeins of blue sky s suri merino 60% baby suri and 40% merino we used the color earth or - 2 skeins of purl soho s worsted twist 1 100% merino each skein is 164 yards/ 100 grams approximately 328 yards required we used the color oyster gray you will also need - us 7 4 5 mm 20-inch circular needles 3 - us 8 5 mm circular straight or even double pointed needles 4 for binding off - stitch marker 5 or scrap yarn gauge 8½ stitches = 1 inch in 2 x 2 rib unstretched size 16 inches high and 18 inches in circumference unstretched 1 https //www purlsoho com/worsted-twist html 2 https //www purlsoho com/yarn html yarn_stitches_per_inch_filter=971 3 https //www purlsoho com/tools/knitting-needles html type_filter=881 4 https //www purlsoho com/tools/knitting-needles html 5 https //www purlsoho com/tools/notions html collection_filter=964
